findings.details: Expanded mobile button targets for post CTA and post site link to meet 44px guidance.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan found no placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts.
Core metadata, OpenGraph, and structured data remain consistent after changes.
Recent posts and pages have descriptive summaries; no placeholder content detected.

recommendations: Continue periodic external link verification when network access is available
Keep mobile CTA sizing consistent as new templates are added
